postReview.title: Brighton 0-3 Aston Villa: Rashford on target in clinical victory
postReview.description: Aston Villa put in a clinical display as goals from Marcus Rashford, Marco Asensio and Donyell Malen saw off Brighton in a 3-0 win.

preReview.title: Hurzeler urges Brighton to show ruthless edge against Villa
preReview.description: Brighton and Aston Villa are both fighting for European places in the Premier League and they face off at the Amex Stadium on Wednesday.

QAData.question: Who won between Brighton & Hove Albion and Aston Villa on Wed, 02 Apr 2025 18:45:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Aston Villa won 3–0 over Brighton & Hove Albion on Wed, 02 Apr 2025 18:45:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Lewis Dunk completed the most passes (63) in the match.

Morgan Rogers was Player of the Match with a rating of 8.6.
Joao Pedro lost the most duels (9) in the match.

Yasin Ayari hit the woodwork 1 times in 3 total shots.
